p: Using ILI incidence data, the forecast skill for the nowcast averaged across all forecast windows is found to be 0.98 (see Fig 4). The best possible forecast skill is 1. If we use the historical ILI incidence data without backfill, we get a forecast skill of 0.95. We see that forecast skill when using backfill data can be substantially better than forecast skill obtained using realtime data (without correcting for backfill). Similar improvements are also shown in Fig 4 for two-week, three-week, and four-week ahead forecasts. Such improvements are to be expected [ 46, 47].
